author: Special Correspondent
text:
The police detained three persons on Saturday in connection with the attack on former MLA Pala. Karuppiah’s house on Besant Road in Royapettah on Friday night.

According to police, some men in an autorickshaw stopped near the former MLA’s house at 11 p.m. and threw stones at the building. The windows of his car were damaged. Hearing the noise, members of the house rushed out, but the miscreants fled the scene. The police conducted an inquiry. However, some passersby had noted the autorickshaw number and given it to the police. Based on this, police arrested Radhakrishnan, Ramu and Arun.
title: 3 held for attack on Karuppiah’s house
